name: Everflame
description:
Everflame lets you take control of two characters, whom must aid each other in surviving the trials as the torchbearers. Enemies have specific weaknesses that usually one of the two characters can exploit one at a time. Work together (as one mind) to win!

Recommended to play the tutorial before hand but otherwise, the controls are:

for movement

for attack

for passing the everflame

 for switching characters

to return to main menu.
